Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.view

Class ViewManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.view.ViewManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
BuilderBuiltObserver, BuilderMovementObserver, BuilderPossibleBuildObserver, BuilderPossibleMoveObserver, BuildersPlacedObserver, ChosenStepObserver, ColorAssignmentObserver, EndGameObserver, ErrorsObserver, GodChoiceObserver, PlayerAddedObserver, PlayerLoseObserver, PlayerTurnObserver, StartPlayerSetObserver, StateObserver, ViewSelectObserver
public class ViewManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements BuilderPossibleBuildObserver, BuilderPossibleMoveObserver, BuildersPlacedObserver, EndGameObserver, ErrorsObserver, PlayerLoseObserver, StateObserver, GodChoiceObserver, PlayerTurnObserver, ColorAssignmentObserver, ViewSelectObserver, BuilderMovementObserver, BuilderBuiltObserver, PlayerAddedObserver, ChosenStepObserver, StartPlayerSetObserver
Author:
thomas Container for Virtual Views. Supposed to multiplex notifies coming from ModelObservable.

    • onBuildersPlacedUpdate

      public void onBuildersPlacedUpdate​(java.lang.String nickname, Coordinates positionBuilder1, Coordinates positionBuilder2, boolean result)
      Sends Model answer to builders positioning request. If the answer (result) is positive (true) then it broadcast this message to everyone, otherwise it sends the message to the view who requested.
      Specified by:
      onBuildersPlacedUpdate in interface BuildersPlacedObserver
      Parameters:
      nickname - player who requested builder positioning
      positionBuilder1 - position for builder 1
      positionBuilder2 - position for builder 2
      result - outcome of the request

    • onBuilderBuild

      public void onBuilderBuild​(java.lang.String nickname, Coordinates src, Coordinates dst, boolean dome, boolean result)
      Sends Model answer to build request. Notifies everyone if the outcome is positive, otherwise it only notifies the selected view
      Specified by:
      onBuilderBuild in interface BuilderBuiltObserver
      Parameters:
      nickname - player who did the request
      src - position of the player's builder that is trying to build
      dst - destination of the build
      dome - true if trying to build a dome
      result - outcome of the request

      Parameters:
      nickname - player who did the request
      src - position of the player's builder that is trying to move
      dst - builder's destination
      result - outcome of the request

      Sends to everyone a notification about a builder that was pushed
      Specified by:
      onBuilderPushed in interface BuilderMovementObserver
      Parameters:
      nickname - player owning the pushed builder
      src - builder position from which it was pushed
      dst - destination of the pushed builder

    • onPlayerAdded

      public void onPlayerAdded​(java.lang.String nickname, boolean result)
      Sends Model answer to nickname registration request. Notifies everyone if the outcome is positive, otherwise it only notifies the selected view (be sure to select the correct view)
      Specified by:
      onPlayerAdded in interface PlayerAddedObserver
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname sent by the view for registration
      result - outcome of the request

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      nickname - player who did the request
      card - card chosen
      result - outcome of the request

      Specified by:
      onMatchGodCardsAssigned in interface GodChoiceObserver
      Parameters:
      godCardsToUse - chosen cards for the entire game
      result - outcome of the request
